! cue vet -e File vet.cue data.yaml
cmp stderr expect-stderr

-- expect-stderr --
translations.hello.lang: conflicting values false and string (mismatched types bool and string):
    ./data.yaml:13:5
    ./vet.cue:2:19
field "skip" not allowed in closed struct:
    ./vet.cue:1:9
-- vet.cue --
File :: {
	translations <_> <_>: string
}
-- data.yaml --
# translated messages
translations:
  hello:
    lang: gsw
    text: Gr√ºetzi
---
translations:
  hello:
    text: Hoi
---
translations:
  hello:
    lang: no
    text: Hallo
---
translations:
  hello:
    lang: nl
    text: Hallo
skip: true
